name: Calculated hours IS Updated Bill Of Material
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Updated Bill Of Material:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Updated_BOM_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval((4 + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> - 1) * 4))) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Updated_BOM_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval((4 + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> - 1) * 4))) *>}{0}[ENDIF]*0.8) *>}{<* Eval(([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Updated_BOM_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval((4 + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*>- 1) * 4))) *>}{0}[ENDIF]*0.8) *1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
